objectives: Students will discuss education and learning using Formal/Business register language
Students will engage with Romance themed scenarios related to education and learning
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of formal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining education and learning content with Romance narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore education and learning through a Romance lens using Formal/Business language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a romantic encounter or relationship development involving education and learning

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice formal register vocabulary related to education and learning in a romance context
Students engage in romance themed role-play about education and learning using formal register
Students create original romance themed content about education and learning in formal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe education and learning in a Romance scenario?
What heart or passion might be involved in education and learning?
Can you create a Romance story about education and learning?
How does education and learning change when viewed through a Romance perspective?
What formal register expressions would you use to discuss this romance scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Romance situation involving education and learning
roles: Character A: Using formal register in romance context
Character B: Responding in formal register within romance theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Formal/Business throughout: Professional, business-appropriate language
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Romance theme: Love, relationships, emotional connections

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Formal/Business register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Romance themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of formal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
